data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body: We would like to inform that the Company has made the payment of fine levied for alleged non compliance of Regulation 17(A) of SEBI (LODR) Regulations. The said fine is paid under protest. We would further like to inform that the Company is in the process of making an application requesting waiver of fines imposed by both NSE and BSE.

data.caption: Revised Disclosure Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015.
data.news_body: Revised Disclosure under Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015.

data.caption: Receipt Of Communication By Way Of E-Mails From BSE And NSE Regarding Alleged Non-Compliance Of Regulation 17(A) Of The Listing Regulations, 2015.
data.news_body: We would like to inform you that the Company has received communications by way of emails from BSE and NSE on 21.08.2024 for alleged non compliance of Regulation 17(1A) of the Listing Regulations and levying penalty thereunder.We would like to further inform you that the Company is taking necessary steps in the matter.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Revised Filing Of Financial ResultsFurther, Certain Figures Were Rounded Off Upto Three Decimals Such As Under Income And Expense Head In Consolidated Financial Results. The Same Has Been Rounded Off Upto Two Decimals And Is Been Filed Again.
data.news_body: The figures mentioned in Financial Results uploaded earlier had certain figures rounded off upto three decimals such as under the head Tax expense, and EPS in Standalone Financial Results.Further, certain figures were rounded off upto three decimals such as under Income and Expense head in Consolidated Financial Results. The same has been rounded off upto two decimals and is been filed again.

data.caption: Revised Filing Of Financial Results For Quarter Ended June 2024.
data.news_body: The Figures mentioned in Financial Results uploaded earlier had certain figures rounded off upto three Decimals such as under the head Tax Expense and EPS in Standalone Financial Results. Further, certain figures were rounded off upto three decimals such as under head Income and Expense head in consolidated financial Results . The same has been rounded off upto two decimals and is been filed again.

data.caption: Revised Filing Of Financial Results For Quarter Ended June 2024.
data.news_body: The Figures mentioned in Financial Results uploaded earlier had certain figures rounded off upto three Decimals such as under the head Tax Expense and EPS in Standalone Financial Results. Further, certain figures were rounded off upto three decimals such as under head Income and Expense head in consolidated financial Results . The same has been rounded off upto two decimals and is been filed again.
